com.innolabs.spydroid

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.mail.Authenticator
      • com.innolabs.spydroid.Mail

  • public class Mail
extends javax.mail.Authenticator
    Mail is a predefined class provided by Google to create a socket connection and send the mail using SMTP
    Author:
    Srikanth Rao

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public boolean send()
             throws Exception
        Send is a final method of type boolean which sends the email and returns a boolean value whether the mail is sent or not
        Returns:
        Boolean value telling whether mail sending was success or failure
        Throws:
        Exception - Exceptions like No Internet Connectivity or Mail attachment i.e File I/O Exceptions

      • addAttachment

        public void addAttachment(String filename)
                   throws Exception
        Method to add attachments to the email to be sent
        Parameters:
        filename - file which is to be attached in the mail
        Throws:
        Exception - File I/O Exceptions handler
